message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity to get a high-quality item at a competitive price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the quality of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $150. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're willing to pay $150, but I'm still looking for a better price. I'm willing to compromise and sell the product to you for $160. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise. I am still unable to go above $150 for the product. I hope we can find a solution that works for both of us.

I understand that you're still looking for a better price, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'll sell the product to you for $155. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts to reach a compromise. I am still only able to pay $150 for the product. I hope we can find a mutually agreeable price.

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to come to an agreement, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $155, but only if you're willing to throw in a small bonus. I think it's a fair deal, considering the quality of the product.
